name: Post Carousel & Slider
author: Tarak Patel

sections.description:
You can create a post slider and carousel for your WordPress site. All you need to do is just a few clicks and your slider will be ready.

DEMO
SCREEN RECORDING

The slider uses auto-generated shortcodes for making it easier to add it to the custom location.

Features

  1. You can create multiple post sliders with different options at single page or post
  2. Custom post type support
  3. Ascending or descending order and Sort retrieved posts
  4. Show posts associated with certain categories, taxonomies & tags
  5. Show posts based on a keyword search
  6. CSS animation https://daneden.github.io/animate.css/
  7. Given multiple design option
  8. Work with Mousewheel & Touch swipe

Support this plugin

Contact me at tarakpatel18@gmail.com if you have any questions
And don’t forget to rate this plugin if you like it.
Thank You
sections.installation:
Admin Installer via search

  1. Visit the Add New plugin screen and search for “Post Carousel & Slider”.
  2. Click the “Install Now” button.
  3. Activate the plugin.
  4. Navigate to the “Post Carousel & Slider” Menu.

Admin Installer via zip

  1. Visit the Add New plugin screen and click the “Upload Plugin” button.
  2. Click the “Browse…” button and select zip file from your computer.
  3. Click “Install Now” button.
  4. Once done uploading, activate Post Carousel & Slider.

Manual

  1. Upload the Post Carousel & Slider folder to the plugins directory in your WordPress installation.
  2. Activate the plugin.
  3. Navigate to the “Post Carousel & Slider” Menu.
sections.faq:
Q. How template setting works

A. You can update HTML code here also add new class as per your requirement.
